001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a type as an implementation of the <em>Builder</em> design pattern.
007 *
008 * <p>The Builder pattern is a <strong>creational design pattern</strong> that separates
009 * the construction of a complex object from its representation. It provides a fluent
010 * or step-by-step API for assembling the parts of an object before producing the final,
011 * immutable result.</p>
012 *
013 * <h3>Intent</h3>
014 * <ul>
015 *   <li>Encapsulate complex construction logic.</li>
016 *   <li>Support optional parameters without telescoping constructors.</li>
017 *   <li>Provide a fluent interface for readability.</li>
018 *   <li>Allow reuse of the same builder to create multiple instances with variations.</li>
019 * </ul>
020 */
021@Documented
022@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.OBJECT_GRAPH)
023@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
024@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
025public @interface Builder {
026
027}
